RT @Aoife_Dooley: Looking for presents for christmas? I've a whole new collection of stuff out this year along with the book. Mugs, t-shirt…

@Aoife_Dooley Can you leave stuff in your Nana’s house if you’re not sure if you’ll need it or not in new place? It’s a great apartment. Seriously nice. Huge bedrooms. So so happy things changed for you for the better. You deserve it x

@Aoife_Dooley @Murtybeach Aldi sell a good dehumidifier apparently. Aoife I’m seriously so happy for you that you’ve got a place. Your excitement online is excellent to see. Brings back memories for me. I remember the feeling of freedom when I got my own place.
Celebrity big brother is already irritating me & it only started tonight, I think. Too much talk about it online. 🙄

@Kodaline Thanks for the gig last night. 👍🏻 See you in June where it’ll hopefully not be as cold as last night. Feel free to do another little Dublin gig in the meantime. 😬 #Kodaline
@CNN @NYFDublin I was there with my sister to see my favourite band @Kodaline perform. The other stuff was a big bonus! Fantastic.
@celtus @Kodaline Was just watching the show on RTÉ player & nearly sure I saw you in the front row as usual. It was fantastic of course wasn’t it. Yes I came home from the gig & watched it again. ☺️
@Kodaline I’ve added my video for you. I liked @SteveKodaline ‘s description on stage of where to upload it. “To somewhere” ☺️
